text: Microapartment is the name for a small apartment. Usually, it is between and in size. Usually, there is one room, with a bathroom, and a small kitchen. Unlike a studio appartment, where the kitchen, and bathroom are in the apartment, there are also cases where several microapartments share a kitchen or a bathroom. Microapartments are popular in large urban centers, where rent is high. They developed from apartment hotels, which were for business trips, at the start. Category:Accommodations
title: Microapartment
